name: Data Engineer
description:
STRABAG SE - Europe's leading technology group in the construction industry, builds projects all over the world by combining people, equipment and construction technology in the right place at the right time. Without teamwork - especially considering the geography of construction - this would not be possible. Become part of our international team!

Key Tasks:

- You implement, test and maintain components designed by the Data Architects.

- You make data available to data analysts and data scientists using the group-wide central data lake.

- You develop & analyze new data sources and prepare the data as needed

- You work intensively with the DevOps Engineer to implement the required data pipelines in the Microsoft Azure Cloud

Our Expectations:

- Extensive experience with ETL / ELT tools in the cloud, preferably in Microsoft Azure Cloud.

- Experience programming data loading and transformation processes on data lake technology (for example, Scala, Java, Python, etc.)

- Sound technical understanding and hands-on experience with modern concepts for (un)structured data, Big Data, Data Lakes and streaming in a cloud context

- Knowledge of data modeling and mastery of SQL as well as query optimizations

- Good communication skills

- Very good German and English skills

Will be a plus:

  • Experience with Microsoft products

We offer:

  • Work with advanced technologies with the opportunity to develop as an expert in the field of Big Data
  • Extended medical insurance, extended period of paid vacation
  • The final salary level depends on professional knowledge and is discussed with the successful candidate

If you are interested in the proposed vacancy and are ready to take part in the competition, we will be happy to meet you!

Human resource development department
